Package com.frogger

Class FroggerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • com.View
          • com.frogger.FroggerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class FroggerView
extends View

    FroggerView

    This is the View class for frogger, which displays the moving frames, death animation and defines the key board listener. It is refactored from original Animal class.
    Refactor:
    1. Moved the boundary checking into FroggerController;
    2. Debugged the original keyboard listener and maintained the pressing move;
    3. The present status of the frogger is stored in FroggerModel.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Kejia Wu, scykw1@nottingham.ac.uk
    See Also:
    View, FroggerController, FroggerModel

      • act

        public void act​(long timer)
        This method with automatically check and update the status of frogger, and if the frogger is died already, iy will check whether frogger death animation is completed or not. If so, the frogger with be set back to start position and the remaining time, frogger image will be set back to start status simultaneously.
        Specified by:
        act in class View
        Parameters:
        timer - Value of present timer counter
